Fixing the CSS so the dropdown icon only appears on `select` elements, not on text inputs or textareas:


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="search_replace">

<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** • Edit file: src/pages/contact.astro</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: undefined, lines removed: 2

```diff
@@ -826,7 +826,5 @@
    input,
    textarea,
-   select,
    .f8-input,
-   .f8-select,
    .f8-textarea {
      width: 100%;
```

**Chunk 2**
Lines added: 22, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -847,9 +845,30 @@
      -webkit-appearance: none;
      -moz-appearance: none;
+   }
+ 
+   /* Dropdown icon only for select elements */
+   select,
+   .f8-select {
+     width: 100%;
+     padding: 1.13rem 3rem 1.13rem 1.13rem;
+     border-radius: 1.15rem;
+     border: 1.5px solid rgba(167, 210, 33, 0.25);
+     background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.8);
+     color: var(--text);
+     font-size: 1.09rem;
+     margin-bottom: 0.9rem;
+     outline: none;
+     transition:
+       border 0.17s,
+       background 0.18s;
+     box-shadow: 0 2px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
+     backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
+     appearance: none;
+     -webkit-appearance: none;
+     -moz-appearance: none;
      background-image: url(&quot;data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; fill=&#39;none&#39; viewBox=&#39;0 0 20 20&#39;%3e%3cpath stroke=&#39;%23a7d221&#39; stroke-linecap=&#39;round&#39; stroke-linejoin=&#39;round&#39; stroke-width=&#39;1.5&#39; d=&#39;m6 8 4 4 4-4&#39;/%3e%3c/svg%3e&quot;);
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-position: right 1rem center;
      background-size: 1.5em 1.5em;
-     padding-right: 3rem;
    }
  
```

</details>

---



---


Fixed the dropdown icon issue in both files.

## Changes Made:

1. **`src/pages/contact.astro`**: Separated the CSS so the dropdown icon only applies to `select` and `.f8-select` elements, not to text inputs or textareas.

2. **`src/pages/kiosks.astro`**: Applied the same fix for consistency.

## Result:

- Full Name, Company, Email Address, and Message fields no longer show dropdown icons
- Only the Product Interest dropdown shows the dropdown icon

The dropdown icon now appears only on select elements, not on regular text inputs or textareas.

---
